mapper.select: select * from t_serial_number where serial_number_id = #{serialNumberId} for update

select t_serial_number.serial_number_id, t_serial_number.menu_name, t_serial_number.business_name, COALESCE(t_company_serial_number.format, t_serial_number.format) AS format, COALESCE(t_company_serial_number.rule_type, t_serial_number.rule_type) AS ruleType, COALESCE(t_company_serial_number.init_number, t_serial_number.init_number) AS initNumber, COALESCE(t_company_serial_number.step_random_range, t_serial_number.step_random_range) AS stepRandomRange, COALESCE(t_company_serial_number.remark, t_serial_number.remark) AS remark, COALESCE(t_company_serial_number.last_number, t_serial_number.last_number) AS lastNumber, COALESCE(t_company_serial_number.last_time, t_serial_number.last_time) AS lastTime, COALESCE(t_company_serial_number.update_time, t_serial_number.update_time) AS updateTime, COALESCE(t_company_serial_number.create_time, t_serial_number.create_time) AS createTime from t_serial_number t_serial_number LEFT JOIN t_company_serial_number t_company_serial_number ON t_serial_number.serial_number_id = t_company_serial_number.serial_number_id AND t_company_serial_number.company_id = #{companyId}
